definition:
the state of a religious                                      
             
             a nun in her 20th year of religion
the service and worship of God or the supernatural
commitment or devotion to religious faith or observance
a personal set or institutionalized system of religious attitudes, beliefs, and practices
scrupulous conformity : conscientiousness
a cause, principle, or system of beliefs held to with ardor and faith
the belief in a god or in a group of gods
an organized system of beliefs, ceremonies, and rules used to worship a god or a group of gods
an interest, a belief, or an activity that is very important to a person or group
the belief in and worship of God or gods
a system of religious beliefs and practices
in: a nun in her 20th year of religion
Many people turn to religion for comfort in a time of crisis.
There are many religions, such as Buddhism, Christianity, Hinduism, Islam, and Judaism.
Shinto is a religion that is unique to Japan.
Hockey is a religion in Canada.
Politics are a religion to him.
Where I live, high school football is religion.
Food is religion in this house.

definition: the belief in the existence of a god or gods
a system of beliefs in a god or gods that has its own ceremonies and traditions
an activity or aim that is extremely important to you
in: Religion is something we always argue about.
The children are learning about different cultures and religions.
As students, socialism was our religion.

definition: the belief in and worship of a god or gods, or any such system of belief and worship:
an activity that someone is extremely enthusiastic about and does regularly:
the belief in and worship of a god or gods, or any such system of belief and worship
in: Football is a religion for these people.

definition: VERB;  pure religion, and undefiled before god is this; to visit the fatherless and the widow in their affliction and to keep oneself unspotted from the world; humble charity.  This is the definition of religion found in the Bible

Marginalized Orientations, Gender identities, And Intersex. it’s meant to be an all inclusive umbrella term for asexuals, homosexuals, multisexuals, trans people, and intersex people. Alternative to LGBTQIAP+
Alternative to MOGII, easier to pronounce.
verb: an act or act(s) of humble charity, giving to someone in need, selfless acts of kindness.~adapted from the KJV of the Bible.

Belief of a higher power. This can range from on god to millions. Monotheism means believing in only one god while Polytheistic is the belief of more than one god. The three largest being Christianity, Islam, and Hinduism.Examples of religions that believe in more than one god are Hinduism, Buddism, and Shinto. Many religions do things to please their gods, goddesses, by having sacrifices, festivals, gifts, fasting, etc.
Religion is NOT evil. The people who taint religion are known as extremists, these people believe that they are doing whats right but kill many in the process.So please don't be ignorant and be respectful!
Is a form of a group of persons that shares the same beliefs

A set of beliefs to explain life's questions. Religion does not mean Christianity, as there are many different religions, and different ways of following each. Contrary to what some think, religion does not cause wars or fighting, as most religions say that fighting is bad. It is, instead, the inability of people to cope with contradicting beliefs.
